name: cpan-testers
comments: High traffic somedays. Great list if you are very interested in up to the minute uploads on PAUSE.
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: cpan-testers-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: This list is for those interested in the organised testing of CPAN modules.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: cpan-testers-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: cpan-testers-help@perl.org
